mosinstall.name: Html Module
mosinstall.author: Gabiriele Lalasava
mosinstall.description: This module allows you to add any html/javascript (within the document's body tag) to a module. It can be used to add affiliate code, copy and paste codes, google adsense etc. You can copy the module using mambo's module copy feature, and create many differnt html content.

param.name: fwd_html
param.label: HTML
param.description: Add any Html or Javascript Here. Eg: Google Adsense Code, Copy and Paste Scripts
